item.title: Remotely Controlling Your Server With IPMI
item.description: In 2010 my life changed dramatically as I moved from Atlanta, GA to Portland, OR. During this time I maintained a 100% remote position where I controlled twenty unique datacenters all over the country with my computer and a VPN connection. Due to to the nature of the company, problems only seemed to present themselves during the early hours (After 12AM). On several occasions I found the need to turn off a production system due to power or cooling issues.
